channel.title: Adding this clan chat
channel.description:
Ok first here is the tut I am using
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,419829.0.html
Second it says above the first code: "Client Class"
Then the Second Code: "Player class" ( i think it's class at the end)
Then the third code: "Commands"
Can anyone please give me some pointers on where I add this stuff in my server files.
Thanks all help appreciated. :)

item.title: Adding this clan chat
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

I just looked at the actual tutorial and i forgot something. If you are using a delta base the commands go in client.java. If you are using a Pi base then they go in the commands file.
Edit: Look at that, I learned yet another thing from Clawz fury.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding this clan chat
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Untrimmed is right, but not always.

In 99% of cases it’s usually a class, although there are Interfaces, abstract classes etc.

Check how the Object is defined, for example, open the file and look, if you see this:

‘public class’ or ‘public abstract class’

Then it’s a class (Or abstract class).

Read full topic

item.title: Adding this clan chat
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

Client class is the same as client.java. Same thing for player class. Commands would be commands.java.

Read full topic
